title: Hospitality sector registers 4.8% Year-on-Year (YOY) RevPAR growth in Q2 2024: JLL
description: India's hospitality sector saw a 4.8% increase in revenue per available room in Q2 2024, thanks to rising average daily rates in most key markets. Despite lower occupancy due to summer vacations, the sector expects a busy upcoming quarter driven by corporate travel and social events, as per JLL's report.
